content.Description: The directory tenant that you want to request permission from. The value can be in GUID or a friendly name format.
The application ID that the Azure app registration portal assigned when you registered your app.
The client secret that you generated for your app in the app registration portal.
Include '@odata_type' field when returned from API.
The version of the Microsoft Graph API to use
Override the Azure AD authentication base URL. Required if using a national cloud.
Override the Graph API service base URL. Required if using a national cloud.
